Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Number of times First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation occurs in the entire event log
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Percentage of variants that include First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation following Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation that are immediately followed by Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Ratio of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation occurrences to Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation occurrences
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Number of cases where First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation appears after a revision cycle (i.e., after RW-EIC Accept or SW-EIC Accept)
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'RW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation that occur within 7 days of First Look-Your updates are overdue
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'First Look-Your updates are overdue'

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation in variants that end with Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation relative to all \Manuscript Submission Confirmation\-type activities (including Original, Revised, Resubmission, and First Look variants)
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Number of variants in which First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation is directly preceded by First Look-Your updates are overdue
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases containing First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation that eventually reach Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation compared to Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation events that occur in the final phase of the process (after an EIC decision such as Accept or Major Revision)
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of times First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation appears in high-performance variants (performance > 30,000,000) versus low-performance variants
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities
